name: vscode-live-sports-scores
description: See live sports scores (football, cricket, and more) in your status bar and a tabbed dashboard. Powered by football-data.org and cricketdata.org.

footballLiveScores.apiKey.description: API key for football-data.org (https://www.football-data.org/client/register). Required for football live scores.

footballLiveScores.refreshInterval.description: Polling interval in seconds for refreshing scores (applies to both football and cricket).

footballLiveScores.favoriteCompetitionId.description: Default football competition ID (e.g. 2021 = Premier League) for live scores.

footballLiveScores.showStatusBar.description: Show a combined live sports status bar item.

footballLiveScores.enableCricket.description: Enable cricket live scores using cricketdata.org (cricapi).

footballLiveScores.cricketApiKey.description: API key for cricketdata.org/cricapi, used with https://api.cricapi.com/v1/currentMatches.

footballLiveScores.cricketMaxMatches.description: Maximum number of cricket matches to show in the dashboard.
